text: Luther is a 2003 biopic about the life of Martin Luther (1483â€“1546). The movie starred Joseph Fiennes as Luther himself and Alfred Molina as Johann Tetzel. == Plot == The movie covers Luther's life from his becoming a monk in 1505 to the Diet of Augsburg in 1530. ==Related pages== * Martin Luther ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2003 movies Category:Movies about Martin Luther Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Luther (2003 movie)
